mistake: No loading state before async fetch of options
fix: Add useState(true) for loading, show spinner while fetching, set false in finally block
Always add AND tenant_id = $N to every database query
Build Map before loop: const map = new Map(items.map(i => [i.id, i])); then use map.get(id)

mistake: No error handling showing user feedback
fix: Wrap in try/catch, show toast.error() with message, log to console for debugging

mistake: Using non-null assertion (!) on find result
fix: Check for null explicitly: if (!entity) return <NotFound />; then use entity safely

mistake: Missing tenant_id in junction table queries (user_roles)
fix: All queries on junction tables must include tenant_id from parent entity

mistake: Submitting analysis reports with false verification claims instead of actual fixes
fix: Always run actual npm commands before claiming pass status. Make real code changes, not just analysis

mistake: Systematic pattern of false verification claims and zero code changes across three consecutive tasks
fix: Builder-ddd needs process intervention - implement actual command execution in verification, make real code changes

mistake: TypeScript build failing with 75 errors across 6 page files prevents all approvals
fix: Must fix all missing imports and components before any task can be approved: Calendar, Skeleton, HeroSection, MetricCard, useCallback, TIME_UNITS, etc

mistake: Creating tasks for flows without auditing existing implementation first
fix: Always run flow audit using Explore agent before creating tasks. 11/25 flows were already implemented.

mistake: Large launch preparation as single monolithic phase
fix: Break launch prep into 3+ phases: P0 blockers first (CI/CD, monitoring), then P1 security/testing, finally P2/P3 polish. Enables parallel streams.

trigger: inot panel consensus, field tech abstention
mistake: Expecting unanimous votes on all decisions
fix: Field tech personas (Mike, Carlos) appropriately abstain on backend/analytics tasks. 5/7 approval with 2 domain-appropriate abstentions is valid.
